_sText:
A hosties map ;D
Took me a lot of my free time and I think it was worth it.

Featuring:


-Cubemaps.

-Combine models.

-4 different types of jails ! Deluxe cell/gravity cell/dumpster cell/normal cells.

-Ambient generics ! A lot of them ! (toilet flush, gravity ultrasonic, generator, fire crack, ... )

-All player's start with a knife only !

-It's hard for T's to rebel.

-A huge amount of secrets !

-Gravity lifts !

-Combine super soldiers model.

-And a lot more !


Other specification:

Gun toss: Yes.
S4S: Yes.
Simon says: Yes.
Knife arena: No, but they can do it anywhere in the map.
Race: Yes.
Spray: No.
Jump shot: Yes.


=====CREDITS=====

Map created by sunshine.
Special thanks to Speed for the awesome ideas and the support.
Also thanks to FPSB. i3D, and chaos labs for making all of this possible.
Software by: VALVe.

<BLINK>Please take you're time to comment and to make an assessment </BLINK>
